        Parameters:
        aMoleculeTypes - Molecule types
        aBoxSize - Box size in DPD units
        aMoleculeFixationInfos - Molecule fixation infos (may be null)
        aMoleculeBoundaryInfos - Molecule boundary infos (may be null)
        aMoleculeVelocityFixationInfos - Molecule velocity fixation infos (may be null)
